```{r}
library(readr)
LeafWidth <- read_csv("LeafWidth.csv")
attach(LeafWidth)
```
```{r}
head(LeafWidth)
```
```{r}
plot(Width~Year)
model = lm(Width~Year)
abline(model)
```
```{r}
cor(Width, Year)
```
```{r}
cor.test(Width, Year)
```
```{r}
summary(model)
```
```{r}
anova(model)
```
